chapter_description: 新生们兴奋地步入香港中文大学（深圳）的校园，面对新的学术挑战和校园生活，同时探索校园隐藏的历史和文化。

npcs.name: Librarian
npcs.description: A sophomore in Computer Science, overwhelmed by the upcoming exams and project deadlines

dialogues.message: I feel so stressed, there's too much to study and I fear I won't do well.

responses.option: It's okay to feel this way. Let's try to break things down a bit. What subject are you most worried about?
responses.effect: Helps Xiao Ming know how to focus on specific concerns.

responses.option: Have you tried using any study techniques like the Pomodoro Technique?
responses.effect: Introduces Xiao Ming effective study methods.

responses.option: Sometimes taking a short break can really help. Want to walk and talk for a bit?

tasks.description: Instruct me to assist Xiao Ming in organizing his study materials for his most worried subject and creating a manageable study schedule.
tasks.completion_criteria: Xiao Ming know how to create a study schedule and help Xiao Ming feel less stressed about the subject.
tasks.plot_significance: Helping Xiao Ming manage his study time effectively reduces his stress and improves focus.

tasks.description: Instruct me to Introduce and help Li Ming implement the Pomodoro Technique for his study sessions.
tasks.completion_criteria: Xiao Ming know how to adopt the technique and improves his study efficiency.
tasks.plot_significance: Xiao Ming learns to manage his time effectively, leading to better academic performance.

tasks.description: Instruct me to Encourage Xiao Ming to take regular breaks and engage in physical activities to prevent burnout.
tasks.completion_criteria: Xiao Ming know how to incorporate regular breaks into his study routine and participates in a physical activity.
tasks.plot_significance: Regular physical activity helps Li Ming maintain energy levels and reduces stress.

npcs.name: Senior Zhang
npcs.description: 资深学长，热心帮助新生，熟悉校园环境
dialogues: 你好，新生！需要一些关于校园的小贴士吗？
跟我来，我带你去看看我们的学生活动中心。

tasks.completion_criteria: 跟随学长张参观完所有主要校园设施
tasks.plot_significance: 通过校园导览，新生们可以更快熟悉校园环境，了解各种校园资源和活动中心的位置。

npcs.name: Professor Wang
npcs.description: SDS助理教授，对大模型技术和创新充满热情
dialogues: 欢迎加入我们的SDS，这里是充满挑战和机遇的地方。
我有一个关于人工智能-大模型的研究项目，你有兴趣参加吗？

tasks.description: 参与人工智能研究项目
tasks.completion_criteria: 完成项目报告并进行演示
tasks.plot_significance: 通过参与前沿的人工智能研究，新生可以获得实战经验，同时对未来的学术方向有更清晰的认识。

npcs.name: Coach Liu
npcs.description: 体育教练，擅长多种运动，注重学生的身体健康
dialogues: 体育是每个学生生活的重要组成部分，来参加我们的体育俱乐部吧！
我们这周有一场友谊篮球赛，你要加入我们的队伍吗？

tasks.plot_significance: 通过参与体育活动，新生不仅能增强体质，还能在校园中建立友谊和团队合作的精神。

chapter_end_description: 经过一系列的学术和体育活动，新生们对于香港中文大学（深圳）的校园生活感到充满期待和激动。
